Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse

Rank: 944


Traveling across the multiverse- Miles Morales meets a new team of Spider-People- made up of heroes from different dimensions. But when the heroes clash over how to deal with a new threat- Miles finds himself at a crossroads.


Director: Joaquim Dos Santos

Writer: Phil Lord, Christopher Miller, Dave Callaham

Stars: Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Brian Tyree Henry

Tags: Computer Animation, Superhero, Supernatural Fantasy, Teen Adventure, Urban Adventure, Action, Adventure, Animation, Family, Fantasy
